verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H238>Listen<s%> to my <S%H8469>petitions.<s%> In your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> relieve <S%H6030>me.<s%>
<S%H935>Don't<s%> enter into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> for in your <S%H6440>sight<s%> no man <S%H2416>living<s%> is <S%H6663>righteous.<s%>

For the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H7291>pursues<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> He has <S%H1792>struck<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H1792>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%> He has made me <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H4285>dark<s%> <S%H5769>places,<s%> as those who have been long <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
Therefore my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> within <S%H3820>me.<s%> My heart <S%H8432>within<s%> me is <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>

I <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%> I <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on all your <S%H6467>doings.<s%> I <S%H7878>contemplate<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
I spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H5315>you.<s%> My soul thirsts for <S%H5889>you,<s%> like a parched <S%H776>land.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H4118>Hurry<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh. My <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3615>fails.<s%> <S%H5641>Don't<s%> hide your <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H4911>me,<s%> so that I don't become like those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

Cause me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> for I <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3045>you.<s%> Cause me to know the <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H2098>which<s%> I should <S%H3212>walk,<s%> for I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my soul to <S%H5315>you.<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, from my <S%H341>enemies.<s%> I flee to you to hide <S%H3680>me.<s%>

<S%H3925>Teach<s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H7522>will,<s%> for you are my <S%H430>God.<s%> Your <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%> <S%H5148>Lead<s%> me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4334>uprightness.<s%>
<S%H2421>Revive<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, for your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H6666>sake.<s%> In your righteousness, <S%H3318>bring<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>
In your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> cut <S%H6789>off<s%> my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> all those who <S%H6887>afflict<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> For I am your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
